profile.title: Software Engineer & Technical Founder
profile.summary.cv: Technology leader and entrepreneur with 15+ years building software across healthcare, AI, and enterprise applications. Founded Fofuuu, a clinically-validated autism therapy platform serving thousands of therapists. Published ML researcher with expertise in full-stack development, deep learning, and healthcare compliance (HIPAA/LGPD).
